page.title: 13CHARTERHOUSE OUTDOOR CENTRE
page.content: The{Charterhouse Outdoor Centre}is a self catering centre situated on the Mendip Plateau. Formerly a village school,it has been running as an activity base for 20 years. The centre can house up to 47 people. Their average stay is 5 days. Activities vary thoughout the year,obviously more physical in Winter. Activities include {caving, rock_climbing, orienteering, {pony trekking, camp craft, {archaeology, geology, environmental {studies, village studies and swimming. Some specialised courses are run including{dance}&{drama. People from all over the country to stay there although most come Somerset as the centre is run by the Somerset Local Education Authority.
